actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to allow an election of the unlimited marital deduction and the qualified terminable interest rules for estates of decedents dying after August 12, 1981, and before January 1, 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to allow an election of the unlimited marital deduction and the qualified terminable interest rules for estates of decedents dying after August 12, 1981, and before January 1, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to allow an election of the unlimited marital deduction and the qualified terminable interest rules for estates of decedents dying after August 12, 1981, and before January 1, 1982.
